alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Tom Green and northeastern Irion Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arden, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carlsbad, San Angelo State Park, O.C. Fisher Reservoir, Arden, Tankersley, Water Valley, Grape Creek and Us-67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
